summary: WHILE DRIVING OVER A SPEED BUMP IN A SHOPPING CENTER PARKING LOT AT ABOUT 1 MPH THE REAR AXLE ON MY MOTORHOME BROKE IN HALF AND THE RIGHT REAR WHEEL CAME OFF! CLOSE INSPECTION OF THE CRACK SHOWED THAT THE AXLE HAD BEEN CRACKED FOR SOME TIME BEFORE IT BROKE. SINCE REPORTING THIS FAILURE TO THE RIALTA TECH WEB SITE SEVERAL OTHER RIALTA OWNERS HAVE FOUND CRACKS IN THE SAME AREA OF THEIR AXLES. IF THIS FAILURE HAPPENS ON A HIGHWAY IT COULD BE TRAGIC. *TT   UPDATED 1/23/14*CN 1/29/14CN

1999 WINNEBAGO RIALTA TIRE FAILURE.*MR  THE CONTINENTAL TIRES FAILED BECAUSE THE NON DRIVE REAR AXLE TUBULAR AXLE FLEXED.  THIS DESIGN CAUSED BOTH TIRES TO WEAR O THE INNER EDGE OF THE TREAD.  BOTH REAR TIRES SEPARATED AND MADE NOISE WHICH CAUSED THE CONSUMER TO STOP THE VEHICLE.  TWO TIRE AND ALIGNMENT SHOP EXPERT TOLD THE CONSUMER THAT THE VEHICLE SHOULD NOT BE DRIVEN UNTIL THE AXLE IS CHANGED OR MODIFIED.  *NM

DT: CALLER HAS A MINI MOTOR WITH HOME FRONT WHEEL DRIVE.  THE REAR WHEEL AXLES BENT CAUSING THE TIRES TO WEAR ON THE INSIDE.  THE CONSUMER COULD SEE THE METAL BEADING ON THE TIRE.   AFTER APPROX 15,000 MILES THE CONSUMER HAD TO PUT NEW TIRES ON.  THIS MADE THE THIRD SET OF NEW  TIRES SINCE THE VEHICLE WAS PURCHASED.  THE OUTSIDE OF THE TIRES LOOKED NEW.  *NM  *NM

REAR AXLE BENDING DUE TO INSUFIENT CAPACITY. THIS RESULTED IN SUDDEN TYRE FAILURE. VEHICLE NOW UNUSEABLE ON ADVICE OF TYRE DEALER AND ALIGNMENT SHOP ON SAFETY CONCEARNS. AXLE BREAKAGE A PROBABILATY,  MORE TYRE FAILURE A CERTAINTY. MANY SIMULAR CASES REPORTED, TWO AXLE FAILURES REPORTED.*AK
REAR AXLES ON SOME WINNEBOGO RIALTA MOTORHOMES ARE GROSSLY OVERLOADED LEADING TO SUDDEN, PREMATURE TRYE FAILURE. TWO CASES OF AXLE BREAKING RESULTING IN WHEEL COMING OFF.*AK

CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL LETTER ON THE COOLING FAN. DEALERS REFUSED TO HONOR THE RECALL LETTER, INDICATING THEY DIDN'T HAVE THE FACILITIES TO PERFORM  RECALL REPAIRS.  MANUFACTURER SUGGESTED TO DRIVE THE VEHICLE 260 MILES AWAY FROM HOME  FOR RECALL REPAIRS.  *AK
THE CONSUMER WAS ABLE TO REMOVE THE KEY FROM THE IGNITION SWITCH,   WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS NOT IN PARK.   *JB   *SC *JB

TRANSMISSION LOCKS UP IN LOW GEAR.  TRANSMISSION IS ABLE TO SHIFT IF  VEHICLE JERKS AND  ENGINE WOULD RACE. HAVE TAKEN TO DEALER THREE TIMES, BUT  WAS NOT ABLE TO DUPLICATE.   PROBLEM IS GETTING WORSE.  *AK

LEFT AND RIGHT CONTINENTAL TIRES, 195/70R15C, CUPPED AND CAUSED THUMPING, WHILE DRIVING, ANOTHER TIRE WENT FLAT, CONSUMER HAD TROUBLE FINDING A DEALER TO SERVICE THE VEHICLE AND HAD TROUBLE REPLACING THE TIRES, CONSUMER IS ALSO CONCERNED THAT THE FRONT TIRES ARE 195/70R15 AND THE BACK TIRES ARE 215/70R15, IT STATES IN THE MANUAL TO HAVE THE TIRES DIFFERENT SIZES.   *YH

LEFT AND RIGHT CONTINENTAL TIRES, 195/70R15C, CUPPED AND CAUSED THUMPING, WHILE DRIVING, ANOTHER TIRE WENT FLAT, CONSUMER HAD TROUBLE FINDING A DEALER TO SERVICE THE VEHICLE AND HAD TROUBLE REPLACING THE TIRES, CONSUMER IS ALSO CONCERNED THAT THE FRONT TIRES ARE 195/70R15 AND THE BACK TIRES ARE 215/70R15, IT STATES IN THE MANUAL TO HAVE THE TIRES DIFFERENT SIZES.   *YH

WATER SYSTEM LINE FAILURE DUE TO INCORRECT ROUTING OF VARIOUS LINES IN ENGINE COMPARTMENT LED TO LOSS OF COOLANT.  LOCAL VOLKSWAGEN DEALER UNABLE TO FIX PROBLEM. RETURNED TO MN AND AFTER TWO TRIES FINALLY HAD PROBLEM FIXED. STARTER POSITIVE SIDE ELECTRICAL WAS RUBBED THROUGH AND SHORTED OUT CAUSING THE CABLE TO WELD ITSELF TO THE CASE RUINING THE STARTER AND THE SOLENOID. THE FAILURE HAPPENED WHEN PARKED BUT COULD HAVE OCCURRED ON I35 THE EVENING BEFORE AT 65 MPH IN HEAVY TRAFFIC. MFG. VOLKSWAGEN BOTH DENY ANY PROBLEM EXIST. *TS        *JB  ***DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12-12-02 CUT OVER TO ARTEMIS***761427

THE ABS SYSTEM AND THE EDL(ELECTRONIC DIFFERENTIAL LOCK) WERE REMOVED FROM THE VEHICLE PRIOR TO THE VEHICLE BEING PURCHASED, WINNEBAGO STATED THAT VW WAS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE ABS AND EDL OMISSION, THE REMOVAL OF THESE TWO SYSTEMS MAKES IT DIFFICULT FOR THE VEHICLE TO MANUVER A SLIGHT UPHILL GRADE ON WET GRASS.  NLM

THE MOTOR HOME DOES NOT COME WITH THE ABS SYSTEM, IN REMOVING THE ABS SYSTEM THEY DISABLED THE ELECTRONIC DIFFERNETIAL LOCK (EDL) AS IT IS OPERATED FROM THE ABS SYSTEM, THE EDL SYSTEM IS CRITICAL FOR THE OPERATION OF THE VEHICLE, THIS DESIGN IS POOR FOR OPERATION OF THE VEHICLE.  *MJS

CONSUMERS HAVE EXPERIENCED A SERIOUS DESIGN DEFECT WHEREIN THE SANITARY SEWER DUMPCHUTE IS POSITIONED MIDWAY BETWEEN THE FRONT AND REAR WHEEL, AS A RESULT WHEN THE VEHICLE GOES OVER ANY HIGH SPOT IN THE ROAD OR SURFACE THE DUMPCHUTE STRIKES THE ROAD OR GROUND CAUSING DAMAGE WITH THE ODVIOUS POTENTIAL OF DUMPING HUMAN WASTE ONTO PUBLIC HIGHWAYS, CAMPGROUNDS AND WILDERNESS AREAS (ATTORNEY FOR CLIENT).  NLM
WHILE DRIVING VEHICLE STALLED OUT AND DIED WITHOUT WARNING.   DEALER HAS INSPECTED  VEHICLE.  *AK
STEERING BECOMES DIFFICULT WHEN DRIVING ON UNEVEN ROADS. DEALER REALIZES PROBLEM, BUT HAS NO SOLUTION.  *AK
